channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No Thanks to the New Minnesota Vikings Cheerleaders
item.description: It’s a campy escapade.

item.title: Retailers scramble to adjust to new reality under tariffs
item.description: Major retailers say they will increase prices or reorganize their supply chains in response to cost pressures from President Trump's tariffs.

item.title: Irish Too Good to Serve Each Other
item.description: What would it mean as a policy for Irish people to expect that the bottom 10 percent of jobs be taken up by immigrants?

item.title: Rabid Leftist Arrested For Threatening To Kill Trump And Major Media Refuse To Cover It
item.description: The threat of homicide is more sobering considering Trump was nearly assassinated twice last year.

item.title: Washington DC leads America in unemployment rate for 3rd straight month
item.description: D.C.'s jobless rate reached 6% in July, a reflection of the mass layoffs of federal workers, and collapsing international tourism.

item.title: Prediction markets show Trump with good chance of snagging Nobel Peace Prize
item.description: President Trump has a good chance of winning the Nobel Peace Prize in 2025, according to bettors on two of the most popular prediction platforms.

item.title: Suspended Time: A Privileged History of Covid
item.description: Gatekeepers and the media elite sentimentalize the memory of the lockdowns.

item.title: Why They Want You to Think Feudalism Is Bad
item.description: A newly surfaced transcript from the Tucker Carlson Show .

item.title: Chris Coons’ Crocodile Tears Over Judicial Nominations Are Pure Hypocrisy
item.description: Senate Republicans should ignore Coons complaints against the White House.

item.title: Illegal migrants charged with rape, aggravated sodomy and kidnapping of woman in Kansas: ICE
item.description: Two illegal migrants were charged with kidnapping a woman in Oklahoma and repeatedly assaulting and raping her on the way to Kansas.

item.title: Trump admin bans federal work-study funds from supporting political activism on college campuses
item.description: The Trump administration has banned Biden-era guidance allowing Federal Work Study funds to pay students for political activities on college campuses.
